rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dang bsams dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni snying rje chen po dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ daci'i phyibazhin/ ba' byor snying rje chen po yang ni tu rnyed la//

byang chub sems dang 'a'i gar yang yod bas/ de'i phyi'i gochad ni snying rjechen po dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// ba 'ba' byang chub sems dang ngas mas dang/khachen po'i go cha de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres

ba dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ daci'i phyir zhen/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang shin tu mngal/ byang chub sems dang/ 'i gocha yang madang sa/ de'i rjer gemadan sa ngas rgyas kyi chos
ma 'dres pa dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po'i ge char ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'brel ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la shin tu mod la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang yod pas/ de'i la gachad na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'drel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems/
su ba dang 'brel ba ma yinete/ de'i phyir zhon/ rab 'byor 'gacig gi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang shin tuud la/ byang chub sems
dpa'i yig cha yang madapas/ de'i phyir gomaden 'anacig pa'i 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'drel pa ma yin zhes byago/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dad 'chen po'i gam dan phyir mi 'ong
ba'i 'bras bu dang 'dre'abun yin/ da' pho'i zhe na/ rab 'byor phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang shin tu mad la/ byang chub sems dpa'i ge cha yang med pas/ de'i phyir ge chad na phyir mi
'ong ba'i 'bras budang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen ngo 'i ge chad ni dgabacam nga nyid dad 'dre 'ang ma yin te/ da ci'i phyir zhan/ rab 'byor
dgra bcom pa nyid kyang shun tu med/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang na du nga sa de'i phyir go cha de ni dgra bcom pa ched 'brel ba ma ya na zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems

dar 'chen po'i go cha nga naseng byang chub dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rang byang chub kyang shin tu nadal/ byang chub san sa dang 'i go ra yang med da sa/ de'i phyi'i ge char ni
byang chub dang 'brel bo ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sum sa dpa'achan po'i go cha de na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyide dang 'brel bu ma yin te/ de ci'i phyi'i zhen/ rang

'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang shin tumedal/ byang chub sems dang 'i ger yang me da ngas/ nga'i phyi'i go chad na lan gyi rnam pa shes nga nyid dang 'brel du ma ya na zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byung
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ige chad ni rnam ra thams cad mkhyen pa de dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyire zhan/ rab 'byor rnam da thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shin tu mang la/ byang
0 @#// chub sems dpa'i go cha yang med pas/ de'i phyi'i gnad ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// gang 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dar ba/
na bo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la stod pa gang dag gis sems can thams cad bdag cag gis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha bgos da de dag gi go cha ni chos thams
sh+tsa cad dang 'brel ba ma yanen// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achenapa sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan 'ad bzla bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshol ba des 23
thos kyi sa'am 'ang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gzhis su degs par mi bgyi ste// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlang sa bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal ba'i byung chu
sems dang bsems chen po de nyan thos kyi sa na/ )rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba'i gnas dang skabs ma mchis te/ de na gnas ma mchis so/ 'dicing zhe na/ byang chub sems dang 'a na mag
dpa' chen pos sa mtshams bcad de/ sams can gyi don du ga mi 'tshal ba mau0f38gas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rang 'byor khyod kyis don gyi dbang gang zhig mthong na/ de skar/
du byang chub sems dpa' sems dara' chen po de ltar go cha bgos shing/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyanyer zab mo 'di la spyod pa des nyan thos kyis ma/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su/
[j]gos nga 'a mi bya'o zhes smras/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de ni byang chub semasu rang bsams dang khachen ngo des sems can nyi tshozhung zad cig gi slad du gor 'tshal ba ma lags/ phashes
cung zad tsho zhig gi slad du gan btsa' ba ma lags te/ da rtsi'i slad du zhenaM/ darom ldan 'das byang chub san sa dang 'a he na sa dang nga chen nga ga ni/ samasacananyanas cad yongs su mya nganalas
babla ba'i slad du go ma tshal to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sam sa dang khachen pos 'dzam ga cad mkhyen nga 'a ye gshegs kyi sung du go cha 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// ded bzhin te/ byang chug ser sa dong 'a sems dang 'chan po/sa ni/ sa mas can cung zad tshe'i don du go ma bgos nga na yani/ yabashes cung zadaki
tsho'i don du go cha bgos pa na yin gyi/ rab 'byob byang chub sen sa dang kha se nas dpa' chen po sa ni/ san sacan dzan na chud yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i
yashes kyi don du gom bags so// gos dang/ brtson ldan 'das shes rab kyi bcol tu phyin dka'ang ni shin tu zab nga ste ngan bus kyang bsgom par mi bgyi/ rtsi sajacasgom
par mi bgyi/ gang du yang bsgom rab ni bgo 'datsa'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'angs shes sngab kyi pha rol tu phyin da zad mo 'di la gang bsgom du 'am 3 gang ma nga' bgyi ba 'am/ gang
gis bsgom par bgyi Tichos gang yang yongs su grub pa dmigs su ma mchis te// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta steg sa kyi re 'ol tu phyin pa bsgom bde ni nam mkha'/
bsgom dgo/ bcom ldan 'das 'dik+ka/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom bde ni chos thams cad bsgom pa'o// bcomaldan 'das di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha ro'i tu pa na pa bsgom
bden ma mchise ra bsgom pa'o// bcom ldanu'angs 'diwAste/ shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa bsgom ngag/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
shesarab kyi pha bal tu phyin pa bsgom pa denangesgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni gang bsgom
pa rnam par bsgom pa yin/ gsol ra/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi dal du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzugs bsgom pa rnamar ba bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di
lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni/ bab sgom pacha ma ra ba bsgomu ra 'o/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta// shes bab kyi re'a'adu phyin pa bsgom pa 'dan/ bdu
shis sgom pa'am ngang bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta sta/ shes rab kyi pol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'dubyedabasgom pa rnam par bsgom dgo/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
0 lta sta shes rab kyi pa 'du byashe ba bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam da ba shes du bsgom pa rnan nga ra bsgom pa 'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni//
mig bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta sta/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcomaldan 'das 'di ltasta/
shes rab kyi dbal tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di'i/ sna bsgom nga rnam par bsgom pa bo// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce pa sgom pa rnam
bar bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi khol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shesapa kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di/ yadebasgom pa rnamadar bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di'i/ gzugs bsgom pa rnam par
bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ gas rab kyi pha rol tu phyon nga bsgomar 'dun/ sgra bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa 'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi nga rol tu
nang bsgom pa 'din/ du bsgom pa rnam ngar bsgom do 'odo btsan ldan 'das dal ste/ shig bab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di// tsa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom
ldan 'das 'di la sta shes bab kyi 'du byed bsgom pa'ani/ reg pa sgom parnam ras bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byon/
pa bsgom pa 'di chosabasgom pa rnam par basosar 'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mig gi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
pa'o/ btsam ldan 'das 'di lta shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di// rnaba'i rnan par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di/ sna'i zlumar la nyes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta sku/ shes rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce nem
pa shes pa bsgom pa rnamar bskyon nga 'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste ka shas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'dine/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom du 'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi Ta
la tu phyin pa bsgomar 'don/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ snang ba'i dus te ga ra
[f]bsgom pa rnam bar bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta sta/ shes rab kyi dbal du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di/ sna 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam da ra bsgom na// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste//

shis bad kyi bo la tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di no ) lce ba dug tu rig pa bsgom pa rnam dag bsgron da lo// bcom ldan 'das bad la sta/ shes kyi nga rol tu phune ra bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus kyi 'dus takheg pa bsgom pa

rnamar bsgom pa'o// btsan ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi phalel tu phunang ba sgom ra 'di ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg nga bsgom dang rnam par pa skyom pa'o// bcom ldamadzadus 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol

dunar bsgom pa 'di ni/ mig gi 'dus tu 'gara'i rkyen gyis tshor bsgom pa rnam nga ba bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i bdus tureg pa'i rkyen gyis

tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shis pakyi yol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ snang ba dus te log pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bskyon da lo// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/

shagar ba kya pe la tu phyir bsgom pa 'din lca'adus tacig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bsgom pa mang ba bsgomang 'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'din/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa

rgyase tshon babasgom pa rnam par bsgom dgo/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes kyi pha bol tu pa sde pa bsgom pa 'din/ yid kyi 'dus te gar nyin gyige tshogad bsgom pa rnam nga bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
[sg ]/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'dan/ sa'i khams pa sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shesarab kya pa lo' tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chu'i khams//
sha bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bad ltaste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ma'i khams bsgomapa rnam par bsgron pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shesab kyi re
wA la tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'daM rlung gi khams sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa 'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta sta ) shes rab kyi bcol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'dan/ nam mkha'i khams bsgon pa rnam par
bsgom pa 'o// bcom lda mang das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi nga sngol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'ad ni/ rnam par shes pa' khan sa bsgon nga rnam par bgrod pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste//
! shes rab kyi de pho'i tu phyin pa bsgros da 'di ni ma ga nga bsgomang rnam par bsnyon du 'o// dam ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shisang ba kyi ra la du phyin pa bsgom ra 'di ni/ 'du byed bsgom pa
tshe rnam par bsgom ra go/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta sta shes bad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgon pa 'di// rnam par shes pa bsgom darnan par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shus bab/
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ming dang gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcon ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi phab la pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skye mched drug
bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shas bab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de sgom da 'di ni/ rig pa bsgom pa rnam nga la baspo ra pa// btson ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes/
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ nyisabab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sred pa sgom pa rnam par bsgom
nga'o/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyir spel tu nga na nga bsgom pa 'di ni/ lanang bsgron da rnam nga ra bsgom pa 'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
bsgom pa 'di ni/ srid pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa 'o/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skyabu bsgon parnam nga ra bsgom pa'o// brtson
ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyi de pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ na shi bsgomang rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta sta 1 shes sab kyi pha rol tu du na nga bsgom nga 'di ni/
bdagabasgom ra rnam par bsgom nga 'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltaste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa bden/ sems can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa go/ bcon ldan 'das 'di

kyaphal tu phyin nga bsgom pa 'din/ skyes bu bsgon dang rnam da rab sgos nga'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi ra lo du phyin pa bsgom pa 'dan/ gang thug bsgomar rnam par bsgom pa'o/

bcom ldan ba dang 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi dar srol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom nga ga/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
nyag rab kyi snga rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di/ tshul khrims kyi srol tu du na nga bsgom pa rnam pa la bsgom pa'o// btsem ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa/
'dini/ bzod pa'i pha brel tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// btsem ldan 'das 'dalta ste/ shes rab kyi dga' tu du na ra bsgom pa 'di ni/ brtson 'grus kyi ba trel du byon pa bsgom/
nga rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pa grol tu phyin pa bsnyon du 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgor pa rnam nga la bsnyon dal/ 'batsom ldan 'das 'di
lta ste shes rab kyi ja po' tu phyin pa bsgon pa 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa bsgyur pa rnam pa ba bsgor ra'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta sta shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/bsgom
pa 'di'i/ nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam dag bsgom pa'i// bcom ldan 'das 'ang lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha sel du dran pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyi stong pa nyid sgom pa rnam pa'i nga sgra pa'o/

rol tu khyen pa bsgom pa 'di'i/ stong ba nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam da ra bsgon da'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phye na ra bsgom pa 'di ni/ chen po stong
'anyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa 'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi phal tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ donadamang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgor da'o//

phyinang bsgom nga 'di'i dus na byas stong nga nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgor nga'o/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta sku/ nyag rang kyi bsal tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid

tu phyin pa ba sgom pa 'di ni/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta// shes rab kyi pha bal tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/
rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa 'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'din/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug nga dgu bal
pa rnam par bsgom pa// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta sta/ shes rab kyi phurol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di'i/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa mod
pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das da lta// shes rab kyipha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mngon ra ra shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di
[z]]b+hA sta shes rab kyi pha bal tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di la sta/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di// gzungs kyi/

'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu nang bsgom pa 'di// ma 'jigs pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom nga 'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta// shes rab kyi lA rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di// so so
yang dag nga 'a bag pa bsgom nga rnam ra ba sgom du 'o/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pa'al tu phyin pa bsgom da/'di'i byams pa chen po bsgom pa rnam do ba nga ston nga 'o/ bcom ldan 'das/
'dil// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ snying rje chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi thol tu phyin da[”]bsgron pa 'di'i/ sangs
rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres ngag bsgom ra rnam nga ba bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltas/ shes rab kyi pha 'a tu phyin pa bsgon nga 'di ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa 'a 'bras bu bsaMm ra rnam par bsgom
pa'o bcom ldan 'das 'di ltas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'an cig phyire bong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom ra rnam nga ra bsgomo nga 'od/ bcom ldan 'dasabadalta sa/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ra sgom pa 'di ne/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa 'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ra sgom/
pa'adano/ dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang byang chub bsgom pa rnam nga ra bsgon nga 'o// bcom
wA ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi phul tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'din/ 'am gyi rnam ra shes pa 'dabasgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha la duphyin pa/
bsgomar 'di ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'dus kyis bka' stsa' ra/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// ded bzhinate/ rab 'byor 'di

byedabasgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta sta/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di// rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'dilta sta )sa/
rab kyi pha khol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mig bsgom parnam pa bsgom pa'o// thab 'bar 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi ba lo' tu phyin pa bsgom pa dkI/ rna bar sgor ba rnam par bsgom ngag
jab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi nga rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'din snabasgam parnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha srol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lcabasgom/

pa bsgom pa 'dani/ yid bsgom/ ngo rnam ra babasgom pa'o// ma lus 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzugsu0f8bgon nga nam da ra bsgom ra'o// rab 'byor 'di lta

shes pab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sgra bsgom pa rnam ra bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rdzol tu phyin nga Tasgom nga bad ni dringasgo na nga rnan ra ba bsgom pa 'od
rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shig bab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ de bsgom pa rnam par bsgom dge bas 'khyer 'di lta ste/ shes pa ba ku re rong chu ngan nga bskum pa u0f8b/ deka kus+son
rnam pa bsgom pa'o/// rab 'byor dalta sta/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di'i mas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// sha'abyor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu du na ra/[}]
bsgomab ni/ mig gi rnam par shes pa bsgomang/ ma bar bsgom pa 'o// ba 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di// rnaba'i rnam par ngashesang/
bsgom pa rnam par bsgomanga'o// rab 'abyor 'di lta ste/ shesab kyi pha rol tu phyineng bsgom pa 'di'i/ sna'i rnam pa shes pa bsgom pa rnamapa bsgomapa'o// rab 'byor bad ltaste/ shes
mab kyi pha rol tu phyin ra bskon pa 'di'i/ lce'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus kyi rnam pa'
shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi sde rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di'i/ yid kyi rnamang ba shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor

[m ]/bsgom pa 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnamapar bsgom pa'o// rab 'bar 'di lta sta shes kyi pho bal tu phyin pa bsgamar 'dazhen/ shagayab kyi nga rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnama'

pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ 'ab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha ba'ol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ngo bo nyide stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bskyom pa'o// rab 'byor 'dit+tan/

[F l]shesarab kyi pha khol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'din/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/

rol tu glan pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzungs kyi sgo bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'dzin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgom pa/
