lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa go/ rab 'byor bdalta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di'i
gu btsam pa ched bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pago/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang byang chub bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// 'du 'byor 'du lta ste/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'din/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byam 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni//
rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// denas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byas 'di
khyu// ltar byang chub sems dang bu sems dang 'a chen rengashasab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zabam 'di la mngon par chags pa me da dam zhes/ nga 'brel shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab/
mo 'di'o ba mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dar bas na sa dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha la tu phyin pa la mngon
ba'achags pa med dam zhes/ bsam gtan gyis rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dang ba sunas dar bachen nga yi ngag su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa'
chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa na da dan zhusu/ brtson 'grus kyi ba sel du phyin nga la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//
! ba'agyur byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhus/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dang 'a sems dang
zla chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa'aran po tshul khrims kyis srol tu phyin pa 'amangon nga ra chags pa med dam zhes/ tshul khrims kyi re
la tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dang 'a sems dang la chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dang 'a sems dang lan po sbyin pa'i ral tu phyin nga la mngon par
chags pa med dam zhes/ sbyin pa'i phal tu phyin pa la byang chub sa nas dpa' sems dang ba chenare yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' chen 'dang ba chenaponang/
stong pa nyid la dngon bar chags pa de da dam zhes nang skongang nyid labyang chub sems dang sems dpa'achen po yongs su brtag nga ra bya'o/ 'ab ba ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dang chan

po khri stong panyide la mngon par chags pamadu dam zhes phyi stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen ro yongs su brtag nga ra bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dar 'gams dang 'a chen po
phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa mad dam zhes/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dang 'a sams dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
dang 'chen po stong pa zhed stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa red dam zhes/ stong pa nyid stongapa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub
nas dang 'a sems dang 'chen po stong pa nyid la mngonang ra chags pa red dam zhes/ chen po stong pa nyid la byang chub sems ra' sems dang kha chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// kha
'byor byang chub sems ngang ra sems dang la chen po don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags ba mod dam zhes don dam pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dang 'a soms dang 'a chen de yongs
[a ]@#// nubartag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dang 'asams dang 'a chen po 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chagasapad dam zhes/ dus byas stong pa 'di la
sa byang chub sems dang bas sa dara'achen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po 'dus ma byas stong ba nyid la mngon pa'i chags pa med dam zhes/
'dugamabyas stong pa 'de la byang chub semasadapa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag nga rabya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dar ba de nas dar ba chen po mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhi de 'amangon
bar chags pa na ra dam zhes mtha' las 'dus pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sen sa dang 'asems ngapa'achen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ rang 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dang 'a

chen po thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mngonang pa chags pa re da nge sa thob na ngang rdzas las pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sanas dang ba semasadung 'tshin pa yongs su brtag par bya'o/
rab 'byor byang chub sems dung 'a sems dpa' chen po der ba mang ra stong nga nyid la mngon par chags pa mang ngam zhes ) dor ba mad pa stong pa nyid 'byang chub se mas dpa' sems dang bachen po yongs

su brtag par bya'o/ 'bar 'byor byang chub sems dang ba se na sa dad 'chen po rang bzhin stong pa nyid la nangon pa chags nga mad ngam zhes/ bad bzhin stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dang ba sems dang 'dun
ba yongs su brtag par bya// rab 'khyer byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenang chag thams cad stong pa nyid la man dpa tshugs pa red dam zhes/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la byang chub sams/
dang kha sams dang 'chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dang 'asems dang 'chen po rang gi mtshan tudistong pa nyid la mngon par chags nga med dam zhes rang gin tshan
'de stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dang ba sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag dar bya'o// rab 'byor byang chung sems dang ba sums dang bachen po mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon nga la chags
ba mad dam zhes/ ma dmugs pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dnga' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o pad 'byor byang chub sa ma sa dang ba sems dpa' chen po dngos po med pa stodad

nyid la mngonangs chags nga med dan zhes/dngos po medad stong pa de la byang chub sems dang ba sa ma ga dang 'tshan nga yongs su brtag par bya'o/ dag 'byor byang chub segs dar ba sems dang 'tshan ngo ngo
bo'i stong pa nyare la mngon par chagasum dadan zhas/ba 'de stong pa nyid 'byang chub sen sa dang kha sa nas dar khachan po yongs su brtag rab byago/ ba 'byor byang chung ba na sa dang 'asemasatar tu
chen po dngos po med pa'i ngang de stong pa nyid la mngon par chags nga med dam chos/ dngos po med pa ngo bo de stong pa de la byang chub sems dar la soms dang khatshan po yongs su brtag da' la
[/ ]@#// rab 'byor byang chub sen sa dang kha sems dang 'chen po dun pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes dan duge bar gzhug pa rnams la byang chub sems dang/
gnas dang ba chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dang ba su mas dang 'chen po yang dgad ra sbyong ba rnams la mngon par chags ramed dam zhes/ yang dag da ra srid pa rnams la
byang chub sems dang 'as mas dang 'chan pa yongs su brtag par bya'o// 'as 'byor byang chub sems dang 'a samus dang 'chen po rdzu 'dra la gyi keng pa rnams la mngon par chags ra na nga ngan zhas/ rdzu
'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang 'chan po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rang 'byor byang chub sams dang re sa mas dang 'a chen pa dbang ba rnams la mngon par chags nga/
mad dam zhas/ dbangang rnams la byang chub saMm sa dang 'a saras dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o rab 'byor byang chub sam sangang la sems dpa' chen po stobs rnams la mngan nga ra
chags nga ma dngam zhesastobs rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// 'du 'byor byang chub sems dang bsams dang 'chan nga byang chub kyi yan lag
rnan sa lamangon par chags pa med dam zhes/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la byang chub sems dang 'a bo na sa ngang 'chen po yongs su ba rtag nga ra bya'o/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dang 'a
samasadang 'chan po 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyadapa la mngon par chags band dam zhes/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa la byang chub sems dang ba sun sadang 'a chen po yongs su
brtag par bya'o// rab 'byar byang chub sems dang bsams dang 'char ngo 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'a na ngon par chags nga nad ngan zhes 'phagasaru 'i bdenang nan sa la byang chub sems dang 'a
sems dpa' chen nga yi dras su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byar byung chub sems dang 'a san sa dang kha chen po bsam gtan rnams 'a ma ngan par chags pa mar dam zhes bsu na gaShAn rnams
la byang chub sems dang 'a sum ga dang 'chen po yongs su brtag nga pa bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dang bachen ngo tshad nad pa rnams la mngon pa nga chags pa na da dam zhes
tshad mdang rnams la byang chub sems dang bsams dpa' chen pa yongs su brtag par bya'o// 'ab 'bya'i byang chub sems dar la sems dpa' chen po gzugs che da pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la
mngon par chags pa'od dam zhes/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la byang chub sems dang gsoms dang 'chen nga yongs su brtag par bya// rab 'byor byang chub semagu dang 'a sems
dpa'achen po rnam par thar pa rnams la mngon par chags pa ma da dam zhes 1 rnam par thar pa rnamasal byang chub se mas dpa' sems dang 'chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o ) rab 'byor byang chub
sems dpa' sems dang bachenang mthar gyis gnas nga 'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa/
la rnams la byang chub sems dang 'a sa nas dang ba chen po yongs su brtag nga ra bya'o// rang 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sams ranga'achen po rnam dar la nga 'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med
pa dang/ smon pa mad nga 'a mngon par chags pa med dam zhesarnam par thar pa 'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan mamed pa dang/ smon pa med da nga byang chub san sa dnga' san sa dang ba chen
po yongs su brtag nga ra ngago/ bang 'byas byang chung sa nas dang 'a sar sa dang 'a chenang mngon par shes pa rnams 'an ngan du 'chags pa red ngan zhus 2 mngan nga rangashes pa rnams la
khyang chub/mas dpa' sems dang ba chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dang bsams dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par chags pa red dam zhes 1 ringange
'dzin rnams la byang chub sems dang lta sa mas dang/ra chen po yongs su brtag par bya'od rab 'byor byang chub sam sa dang 'a so nas dang 'chen bro gzus kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags nga na da
dam zhes gzungs kyi sgo rnams la byang chub sa mas dpa'i sa ma sa dpa' chen da yongs su brtag par bya'ogo/ bab 'byar byang chub sems dngangasams dpa' chen po dbazhin gshags pa'i stobs
[z/] rnams la mngon par chags pa red dam zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dang khachen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ bang du byang chub sems
dang 'a sems dpa' chen po ni 'jigs pa rnams la mngon par chags nga mong ngan zhes/ mi 'jigs pa rnan sa la byang chub sa ma sa dang 'asam sa ngang 'a chen nga yongs su brtag pa la bya'o//
ba 'byor byang chub sems dang 'a nyan sa dang ba chen po so so yang dag par g pa rnams la mngon par chags pa mad dam zhes/ gso yang dag pa 'jig pa rnams la byang chub sems dang la sems dpa'

chen po yongs su brtag nga la bya'o// gang 'byor byang chub sen sa dang 'a ams dar 'chen po spyan sa pa/ chen po 'a mngon ra ra chags nga na nga dom khus 1 byon sa pa chan pa 'a byang chug se na sa dang la
sems dang bachenang yos su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byob byang chub sems dpa' sums dpa'aman nga snying rje chen po la mngon dab chags pa med dam zhes/ snying rjechan po la byang chub sems dang la
sa mas dang 'a chen po yongs su brtag dag bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dang ba sun sa dang ba chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la nangan par chags pa mang ngam khus sangs
rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la byang chub sems dang 'a sams dang 'a chen ngo yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dang 'a sems dang ba chen po thams cad shes pa nyid
la mngon pa la chags pa ni da dam zhes/thams phud nyes pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dang khachan da yangs su brtag par gru'/ 'kha 'bag bang chub sems dang 'a
sams dpa' chen po 'am kyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mngananga' chags pa re da dam zhes/ 'a ma gyi rnam nga shes pa da lta byang chub sa nag dang 'a sam sa dang la chen de yongs su brtagang bya'o

@# bab khyor byang chub sen sa dad 'a sa na sa dong 'chen po rnam pa thunas cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngonang ba rags pa med dam zhes/ rnan pa thams cad n khyen pa nyid la byang chub san sa dang kha sar sa dang 'a
napo yongs su brtag par bya'o/// shag lab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong drag nga rgyang ban de nyis brgya nyer lnga pa/// phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub

sams dang 'a semasadang ba chenang de shes thang kyi gong tu phyin nga thaban 'di la spyod ngagar/ nga ral gyis sbas pa dang/ pha thol gyis bstan ngo lta skyong par ma lta 'an/ phyir mi lde ga nga 'dra nga
chub sems dpa' sems drang ba chen po du shes rab kyi se sa pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sngon ra'i tshe) phul kyi dad pas mi 'gro 'an/ le ma ldog nga'i byang chub sems dpa'
dpa' chen po dazhes sngab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sbyor pa'itsha 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sa nas bskyod pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ zhe sdang dang bcas ra Ti sems bskyed
nga sa'aphrogs pa ma yin nam/ gti nug dngacas nga'i sams bskyar nga sa 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ mi ldog pa'i byang chub san sa dang 'a sems dang chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
na nga zab mo 'di la spyod nga 'tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ tshul khrims kyi phu la tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ bzad pa'i rol tu phyin pa dang bral
'an gyur na// brtson 'grus kyi dal tu phyinang dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ bsam gtan gyi rab tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/ shesapa da kyi dpa'o tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur
dam zhes yongs su brtag par bya sta/ gal te phule ma ldog pa'i byang chub san sa dang bsams dang brten po de shes pa ba kyi nga la tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa 'i tshe/ mi 'jigs ma sdang skrag par
mi 'gyur la// nyam pa dang yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing/ nga'i yid phyir nur bar ni 'gyur te/ shasal bkyi ba sogs bag du phyin pa zab mo 'di thos da ra dga' la/ thos nas kyang 'dzin rung
'changal/ klog cing kun chub par byed de/ tshul bzhinadu yid la khyad la/ de bzhinazid du nan tan du byed na/ rab 'byor byung chub sems dang 'a sems dang 'chan po des ni sngon
gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha lo tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su bris shing yongs su brtag dar byas pa dang/ bzung nga bcangs te/ kun chub par byas pa dang/ tshul bzhin du yid 'a[I]
shukla/ byas par rig par bya'o// ci phyir zhan/da na 'di ltar phyi'i ma ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'tshan po de shes pa kyi pha re la tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bachad pa'i
sa tshe/ ma 'jigs sngang skrag par mi 'gyur// zhum pa ra ma 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing/ de'i yid kyi phyir na ldog la thos nas kyang yongs 'dzin cing 'chang la/ klong
t+tA cing kun chub par byed de/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i phyir ro// gsal nga/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' san sa dang 'a chen po gang shes rab kyi rala' tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
rmakhastan pa'itsha/ ma 'jigs ma sdang skrag pa'am 'gyur zhing/ zhumanga' mi 'gyur/ yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sen sa dang 'tshan pa desapa'os
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ji ltar brtag par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkab stsalang/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des// rnam pa thams cad na byel
T+Tha nga de la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di brtag par bya'o// gsal nga ! bcom ldan 'das ji ltaran rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i
bsam pas/ byang chub semasadar 'a sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rtog pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsaka[']nga/ rtsa bas stong pa nyid la
[gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub semasadapa lamadapa' chen po shagarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor mtshanamamad pa la gzhol ba'i bsan das/ byang chub sems dpa'/
sams dang 'chen po shes rab kyi phama'o tu phyin pa zab ma 'dul rtog pa yon/ rab 'byor smon pa nod pa 'gazhol ba'i bsamangs/ byang chub sems dang 'asems dang ba chen de nas
rang kyi dzasol tu phyin nga thab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sa na sa dang 3 sems dang 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha ba'i tu pan nga
zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ bab 'byor slu ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas ) byang chub sems dang ba sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'e rtog nga yane
rab 'byor 'gag pa med pa la gzhol pa'i bsam pas/ byang chung sems dang 'a sen sa dang bachen po shes rab kyi Ta srol tu ran pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byin kun nas
nyon mongs pa me da pa la gzhol pa'i bsam ras/ byang chub sems dung ba sems dang 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor rnam par byung ba mad
ba la gzhol ba'i bsam pa sa byang chubs nas dnga' sa 'dang 'chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ ba 'byor de bzhin nyid la gzhal ba bsam pas/
[r]nga// byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'abyor chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsamangus/ byang chub//
sha semasadapa' sems dpa'achen po ngashes thad kyi phaba'o tu phyin pazab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ baba'abyor yang dag pa'i mthar la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub nas dang 'a sen sa
dpa' chen po shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sanas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes 'du
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ bab 'byor bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen pong shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
bzab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po shes khab kyi rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtag ra
'an rab 'byor rmi lamal gzhol ba'i bsam ras/ byang chub sems dpa'amams dpa' chen po shes rab kyi dbal tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ ba 'byas gzugs brnyan gtog
ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenangong shasabab kyi pha rol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yone/ rab 'byor sgra brtan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chubs/
dada' sogs dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rngal tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'a rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor smig rgyu 'khagazhol ba'i bsanang sa/ byang chub sems dpa' sam sa dang chen po ngags bag
kyi ral tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor sgyu ma la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub semasadang 'a soms dang 'chan de shes rab kyis rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog
ba yin/ 'ba'am lnga' pa la gzhol ba'i busan das/ byang chub sems dang 'a sa nas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'u rtog pa yinan// gsald/
bcom ldan 'das da lta'i stong pa nyade la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen shes rab kyi bgrol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur mtshanam
mad pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dang 'a sems dang ba chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zang na 'di la rtog dar 'gyur/ smon pa mad nga 'gazhal ba'i bsam dag
byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'ad la rtog par 'gyur/ nam ma kha' la gzhal ba'i bsam pas// byang chub sems dang la sems dpa' chen
ba shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ skye ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
@#// mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ 'gag pa ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub semasadapa' sums dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa zab mo 'di la
thog mar 'gyur/ kun nas nyon mongs dam mchis pa dang/ rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po shes rab kyi da lo' tu phyin
zab mo 'di'i rtog pa la gyur/ de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i rjesam nga sa byang chub sems dang 'a sams dang 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ chos kyi
dbyinges la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chubs mas dang 'a sems dang 'chan dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ yang dag pa'i ma thal 'a gzhol ba'i bsam
ngas byang chub san sa dpa' sems dang 'a chen de bas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog dar 'gyur/ mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsan pas/ byang chub sems da lta gnas
dad 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab ma bdage rtog par 'gyur ) bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'i dbyinges la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ mngon par 'du bgyi bam mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dang bsams dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
'di la rtog par 'gyur/ rmi lam la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dang ba soms dang 'chan po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zabama'adi la rtog par 'gyur/ gzugs b.rAn
la gzhul ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub san sa dpa' sems dang la chen po shes 'od kyi ba tshol du phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog nga' 'gyur/ sgra b.ran la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub gnas
dnga' sems dpa' chen do shes rab kyi pha bo'o tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ lcagu rgyu 'a gzhol ba'i bsan sa )byang chub sems dang 'a sems dang ba chen po shes rab kyi kha
la tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ sgyu ma la gzhol ba'i bsam nga su/ byang chub sum ga dang 'a sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtogabar 'gyur/
sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' de nas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur na/ btsam ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po gzugs la rtog pa 'gasasam 2 tshor ba la rtog pa 'gas sam/ 'du shes la rtog pa la gsasam/ 'du byed la rtag pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags
sam/ migel rtog pa lags sam ) rna ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sna la rtog pa lags sam/ lci la rtog pa lags sam/ lus la rtog pa lags sam/ yid
ba gru la rtog pa 'gas sam/ gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ sgra 'a rtog ra lags sa sa/ de la rtog pa lags sam/ rol rtog dalags sam)ga
bya la rtog pa lags sam/ chos la rtog ra lags sam/ mig gi rnam ra ra shes pa la rtogapa lags san/ rnaba'i rnam par shes pa la rtogapa 'gasasam/ sna'i rnam pa bshes da
la rtog pa 'gas sam// lce'i rnam pa las nga la rtog nga 'a gas sam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa 'gas sam/ yid kyi rgyun da ba shes pa la rtog ra lags sam/ mi ga gi
'dus par ga ra la rtog nga 'a gas gam 3 cha ba'i 'dus te reg nga la rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa la rtag pa lags sam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa la rtag pa lags san/ lus kyi
'dus te reg pa la rtog nga lags sa ma/ yid kyi 'dusU ta reg nga 'a rtog pa lags sam/ mgag 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa 'gas san/ rna ba'a'adun ta reg pa'i rkyen gyis
wA tshor ba la rtog ra la gas sam ) sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa 'gas sam/ 'di 'dus tag pa'i rkyenagyis tshor ba la rtog ngal gsasam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyan gyis
tshor ba la rtog pa 2 gas sam yad kyi 'dus te regar 'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtogar 'gas sam/ sa'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ chu'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ ma'i khams la
rtog pa lags sam/ rlung gi khams la rtogs pa lags sam/ nam mkha'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la rtog pa lags sam// ma rig pa la rtog pa lags
sam 'du byed la rtog pa lugs sam/ rnam par shes pa la rtog pa 'gas sam/ ming dang gzugs la rtog pa 'a gsasam/ skyamachor drug la rtog pa lags sam/ reg nga 'a chog pa
lags sam/ tshor ba la rtog pa 'gas sam/ srad pa la rtag pa lags sam/ lan nga la rtog nga 'a gas sam sude ra la rtog pa 'gasasan/ skya ba 'a rtog pa 'dags sam//
rga shi la rtog pa 'gas sam sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ tshul khrin sa kyi pha rol tu byed pa la rtog pa lags sam/ bzod pa'i de la tu phyin nga la rtog pa 'a gas
sam brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa lags sam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin nga la rtog pa 'gas sam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa 'gas sa ma/ nang stong pa kare
la rtog pa lags sam/ phyi stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa 'gas sam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rtog palags sam/ chenang stong pa 'de la rtog pa
lags sam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyidel rtog pa lags sam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la
rtog pa lags sam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyidel rtog pa lags sam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la rtog ra lags sam rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rtag pa lags/
sam chos brasas cad stong pa nyid la rtog pa 'gagu sam ) rang gamtshan nyid stong ra[']nyeng lartog pa lags sam/ ma dmigs pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dngos po med pa
stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ ngob 'de stong pa nyid la rtog pa 'gas sas ) dngos de ni da da 'i ngo bo 'de stong pa nyid la rtog pa 'gas sa ma// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la rtog pa
kha gsasan// yang dag du na sbyong ba rnams la rtog pa gdags sam// rdzu 'du la byi dang nga rnams 'a rtag pa 'gas sam/ dngang po rnams la rtog pa la gas san/ stobs rnams la rtog pa
lags sa/ ! byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la rtog pa 'gas sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad nga la rtog pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la rtog nga lags sam/
bsam gtan rnams 'a rtog pa 'gas sam )tshad ni da pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam 3 gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams la
rtog pa 'gas sam/ mtha rgyas gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshanam med pa dang/ smon pa med pa la rtog
po 'gas sa// mngon par shes pa rnams rtog pa 'gas sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnan sa la rtog pa'i gas sam/ gzungs[”]kyi sgo rnams 'a rtog pa 'a gas sa ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
stobs rnanan 'a rtog pa 'a gas sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'a rtog nga 'a gas sa na// byan sa nga tshan pa 'a rtog pa 'dags sa//
snying rje chen po la rtog pa la gas sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ thams cad shes pa nyid 'a rtag nga 'a gas sa ma/ lam kyi rnam pa zhes pa nyid la
rtog pa lags sam/ rnam da dran sa rud mkhyen pa nyid la rtog pa la gas san/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal nga// rang 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'tshan
bon gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no// tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// 'du shes la rtog pa ma yin no// 'du byed la rtag pa ma yin no// rnam da ra nyes dal rtog pa ma yin no// ra gal
rtog pa ma yin no// rna ba 'a rtog pa ma yin no// sna la rtog pa ma yinan// lce la rtog pa ma yin no// 'as 'a rtog pa na yin no// yid la rtog pa 35na no// gzugs la rtog da ma yin no//
sgra la rtog pa ma yin no// dri 'e rtog pa na yin no// ro la rtog pa ma yin no// reg 'a rtog pa na yin no// chos la rtog pa ma yin no// mig gi rnam da na shes dka' rnyog nga ma yin no// rna ba'i rnam
ca/ par shes ngag tu rtog pa ma yin no// sna'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa su yin no// lce'i rnam pa shes pa la rtog pa sku yin no// lus kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa la//
yab yin no// yid kyi rnam par shesar la rtog pas yin no// mig gi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin// rna ba'i bdus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yinan// lce'i
'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus turag pa la rtog pa ma yin no// mi gag 'dus tareg nga'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog
pa ma yin no/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg nga 'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa na yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog da yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
tshor bal rtog pa ma yin no/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'a rtog pa ma yin no// sa'i khams la rtog pa
na yin te// chu'i khams la rtog nga na yin// ma'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no// rlung gi khams la rtog pa na yin// na mkha'i khan sa la rtog pa na yin no// rnam par shes da'i
khams la rtog pa ma yin no// ma rig da la rtog pa ma yin// 'du byed la rtog pa ma pa nani// rnam pa ngashes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// ming dang gzugs la rtog pan yin no// skya na ched drug ]
la rtog pa ma yin no// theg pa la rtag pa ma yin no// tshor ba 'a rtog pa na[']yin no// srid pa la rtag ra ma yin no// 'a na nga la rtog pa na mgo/ srid pa 'a[']rtog pa ma yin// su ba rtog pa//

yin no// rgashi la rtog pa ma yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin nga la rtog du yin no// tshul khrims kyi ja po' tu phyind 'a rtog pa na yi ge no// bzod pa'i pha re'i tuphyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no// bzhi
bsdus kyi pha sa' tu phyin pa la rtog pa ma yin no// bsam gtan gyi dpal tu na nga la rtag pa ma yin// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na nga 'a rtog nga ma yin no// nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yag

phyi stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// phyinang stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// stong pa nyid stong nga nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// chen po stong pa de la rtog pa ma yin no// don dam pa stong du nyid la
rtog pa na yin no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'a rtog pa ma yin na// thog ma dang tha ma mdang

stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// pa ba med pa stong pa nyid la rtog nga na yin no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin na// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// rang ginatshan nyid

stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// mi dmags pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// dengs po med pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// dngos po med pa'i de
bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// yang dag nga ra spong ba rnams 'a rtag pa ma yinan// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang nga rnams la
rtog pa ma yin no// dbang po rnan sa la rtog nga na yin no// stobs rnams 'a rtog pa ma yin no// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la rtag pa ma yin no// 'phags pa'i 'a malan 'gabargyud nga la rtog pa ma
yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la rtag pa ma yin no// bsan gtan rnan sa 'jog nga ma yin no// tshad med nga nan sa la rtog pa ma yin no// gzugs med pa 'i son sa dang 'jug pa rnams la
rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par thar pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'a rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang// mtshan ma med pa
dang smon pa med da la rtog pa ma yin no// mngon par shes pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin go/ ting nge 'dzi'i rnam 'a rtog pa ma yin no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa su yin no// dbazhi gshegs
ba'i stobs rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// ma 'jigs pa rnams la rtag pa ma yin no// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la rtog pa yin no// byams pa chen po la rtog pa ma yin no// sAng jo
chen po la rtog pa ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtogapa ma yin no// thams cad shes pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin/
nam pa than gcad makhyen pa nyid la rtog nga ma pa nen/[. ]/ci'i phyir zhen/ rang 'byor de na 'od ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa dazhi/ sus kyang n byas/ rnam/
dang ma byas/ gang nas kyang na rongs/ gangadu yang ma song/ phyogs na yang mi gnas/ yul na yang mi gnas/ gang na ltadang na gnas pa ste/ de la grangs mi dan gas sa/ 'gro ba dang
'ongab na nga mi dmigs so// gang la grangs mi dmigs shing 'gro ba dang 'ong ba ma dmigs pa de ni/ gang gis kyang mngon pa 'tshang rgyu bar ma nus te/ gzugs kyis ma yin no/ tshor bas ma
min// 'du shes kyis ma yin no// 'du byed kyis ma yin no// rnam par shes pas na yin no// mi gnyis ma yin no// rna bas na yin no// sna sa ma yin no// sa ma yanan/ lus
kyis ma yin no// yid kyis ma yin no// gzugs kyis ma yin na/ sgras ma yin no// dris ma yin no// res na min no// seg gis ma yin no// chos kyis ma yin mo/ mig gi sbrel
pa shes pas na yan// rna ba'i rnam pa shes dag ma yin no// sna'i rnam par shes pas ma yin no// lce'-i rnam par shes pas ma yin no// lus kyi rna dngashes pas ma
yin no// yid kyi rnam pa rangashes ra sa ma yin no// mig gi 'dus te reg nga sa ma yin no// rna pa'i 'dus te reg pas ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te thog pas ma yin/ de'i 'dus te'og
thamagyu/ pas ma yin lus kyi 'dus te reg pas ma yin no/ yadekya'i dus te lag pas ma yin no// mig gi 'dus tayeg nga 'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no// naba'i bdug
a rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no// sna'i 'dus ti gar 'i rkyen gyis tshor bsam yin no/ rtse'i 'dus tarig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas ma yin no/lus kyi 'dus tareg pa'i rkyen gyis
wA tshog pas ma yin no// med kyi 'dun pa rig pa'i skyon gyis tshor bas ma yiwen// sa'i khoms kyis mA yin no// chu'i khan sa kyis ma yin no// ma'i khams kyis ma yin no// rlung gi khams
kyis ma yin no// nam mkha'i khams kyis ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis ma yin no// mang ge dus ma yin no// 'du byed kyisan yin no// rnam par shes pa sa mo yin no//
nga dang gzugs kyis ma yin no// skye mched drug gis na la zhen/ pheg pas ma yin no// tshor bas ma yin no// srad pas ma yinen// len pas ma yane'o// srid pas na yin no// skyabs
ma yazhin// rga shis malano// sbyine pa'i pha rol du phyin pas ma yin no// tshul khrims kyi pa'ol tu phyin ra sam yin no/ bzodang 'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no// brtson 'grus kyi pha
sol tu phyin pas ma yin no// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ras ma yin no// nang stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// phyi stong pa nyid kyis ma yigo
phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis ma yin// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// chen po stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// den dam pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis ma yin
no/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// mtha' las 'das pa stong da nyid kyis ma yaneno// thog ma dang tha na na da pa stong ra nyid kyis ma yin no// de ba ni nga pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin
no rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// chosadzams cad stong pa nyid kyis ma yinan// nga gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// ma da gas nga stong pa nyid kyis ma pa ste// dngos

ba mad pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// dngos po med pa'i ngo ba nyid stong pa nyeng kyis ma yin no// dran pa'i bar gzhag pa rnams kyis ma yin no// yang rag
ba song ba rnams kyis ma yin no// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis ma yin no// dbang po rnams kyis ma yin no// stobs rnams kyis ma yin no// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis ma yan
no 'phags pa'i lam yan la ga brgyad pas ma yin no// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis ma yin no// bsam gtan rnams kyis na mi naso// tshad med pa rnams kyis ma yin no//
gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis ma yin no// rnam par thar pa rnams kyis ma yin no// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus ma yin no/ rnam par thar/
pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshanam mad pa dang/ smon pa med pas ma yin no// mngon par shesapa rnams kyisem pa na// re re 'dzin rnams kyis ma nen//
gzungs kyiso rnams kyis ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis ma yin no// ma 'jigs pa rnams kyis ma yin no// soso yang dag par bge pa rnams kyis ma yin no/
nag pachen pos ma yin no// snying nang sa na yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis ma yin// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus ma yin no// lan cig phyir bong
kha'i 'bras bus ma yin no// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma yin no// dgra bcom pa nyid kyis ma yanan// 'ang byang chub kyis ma yono// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis ma yin no rnamud
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis ma yin no/ du ci'i phyi zhen/ gzugs de kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// tshor ba nyid kyang rnam nga thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/
'du shes nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'du byed nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de// mig nyid kyang

gam ra thams cad mkhyen pa dad// rnapa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhanang zhing da// snanyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lce nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'as nyid
nam sa cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mdonyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidado// gzug nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sgra nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa de do// dri

nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyan nga nyid do// ro nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// reg nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// chos nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad na khyen pa nyidado//
ga gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sna'i rnam par shes nga nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid do// lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nga nyid de// lus kyi rnam ra ra shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad na khyen pa nyid de// yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyidado// mig gi 'dus tarig pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sna'i 'dus te gar nyid
kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam da thams cad makhyen pa nyid do// yid kyi 'dus

ta theg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyide do// mige gi 'dus leg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnamaratshamasacad mkhyanar nyide da// rnaba'i dusatalegapa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de kyang rnam
nga thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// tsA'ibs leg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa than na cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lce'i 'dus te theg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa

thob/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyan gyis tshor ba nyid nam pa thams cad na khyen pa nyid do// yid kyi 'dus te ga nga'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyidakyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid do// sa'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen nga nyid do// chu'i bams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// ma'i khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rlung
gi khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// nam mkha'i khams zhing kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam dang shes nga 'a khams nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de
mthig ra nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'du byed nyid kyang rnam pa thums cad mkhyen pa nyid de// rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang rnam patshams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/ ming dang gzug
nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// skye mched drug nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// reg girakyang rnam pa thamasar mkhyen pa nyid de// tshor ba nyid kyang mAr nas

cad mkhyen pa nyid do// srad nga nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// zhen pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyanar da do// sung pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidago/ sku ba nyid

kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rga shanyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// sbyin pa'i pha la tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam pa thamasacad makhyen panyid do// tshul khrims kyi pha thog tu/

phyin nga nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nga nyid do// bzod pa'i pha bo' tu phyon nga nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// brtson 'grus kyi phabal tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnaman thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de//

bsam gtan gyi bzol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnan da thams cad mkhyen da 'ad de// shesarang kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang rnam da than su cad mkhyen nga 'de do// nang stong pa nyid kyang rnam ra thams cad na byin

pa nyidad// stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidad// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams rud mkhyen pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//

nang stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams rud mkhyen pa nyid de// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rnamar thanas cad mkhyan pa nyid do/ 'dus

khyag stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyide da// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad matshon

pa nyid do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa nyid do// chos thams cad stor ra nyare kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
dpa nyid do// bang gne tshan nyid stong pa nyidakyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// dngosar dar stong

pa nyidekyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// ngo bo nyide stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid do// dngos po re da nga 'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// dran

pa rta la gzhag pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidado// yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid ngo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyide kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// dbang
pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyed de/ stabs khyed kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de// byang chub kyi yan la gnyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidad// 'phags pa'i 'a ma/
yana' ga brgyad pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du// 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de// bsam gtan nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidad//

tshadan da pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/ rnam par thar pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/
nyid do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad na khyan nga nyid do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smonar med pa nyid kyang nam

pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// mngon pa shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ ting nga 'dzin nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang rnam pa [<]mas
cad ma byan pa nyid do/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyed de// mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang rnam nga thamasucad mkhyenang nyed do// so so yang dag par ga red kyang rta/

batshan sa cad mkhyen pa nyidado// byams pa chen po de gyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de// snying rje nyamapa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ted de// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang
rnam pa thams cad ma khyen nga nyid do// daci'i phyi ba zhe/ rang 'byar den 'od ltar gzug[']de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang 3 rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de pa
ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de na/ rdo bzhin ched gcig pag/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin
nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mdu na pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de// dang na nyid gcig pa'o// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnamar thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dazhi/ de bzhin ted gcige pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i de nga zhin 'de gang yin pa dang/ rnal ngo thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin gang yin pa de'i/ de
bzhin nyid gcig nga 'o// mig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin khyed gcig pa 'o// rnaba'i hi

ba ngazhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thanas cad makhyen pa nyid kyi re bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dbazhin
nyid gang yin pa de ni ) dbazhin nyid gcig nga 'o// 'di bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyadanga'anye nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhane zhing gcig pa'o// lus kyi de
bzhin nyeng gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad na khyen nga nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin nga de na/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyan

pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 3 de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang ) rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhanyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//

sgra'ade bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi re
bzhin nyid gang yin pa den/ de bzhi nyid gcig pa'o// de'i ro bzhin regang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/ regagide bzhin

nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig da'o// chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
gang yin pachen/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mgagi rnam par shesar 'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ro bzhi de gang yan pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//

rna ba'i rnam pa bshag pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam ra than sacad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin khyed gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin 'di gcig nga 'o/ sna' rnam par shes pa 'a de bzhi nyid gang yane pa

dang rnam pa thams cad n khyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yind de ni/ dubazhin nyid gcig pa 'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyerakyi de bzhin nyidabang

yin nga de ni/ de bzhin nyide gcig pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dpa'inyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyide gcig pa'o// yid kyi

rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ting kyi de bzhin zhingagang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig da 'og mig gi 'dus te reg nga gide bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/

rnamar zams cad makhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// na ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i dbazhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnamar zan sa chad bya sha nga 'ad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
dani de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sa'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin rarang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang zhe pade'i/ de bzhin nyid gcig
pa'o/ lcagi 'dus tapheg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thums cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dazhu/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'i// lus kyi 'dus te reg nga 'ire bzhinyid gang
yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bzhin nyid gang yin pa dan/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad na khyen pa nyid kyi

tsa de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de// de bzhi'i dugacig pa'o// mge ga 'jus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad na khyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/
dbazhin nyid gcig ra 'o// rna ba'i dus tag pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad m khyan panyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin nga de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//

sna'i bdus te reg pa'i rkyenagyis tshor ba'i de bzhin de gar yane pa dang/ rnamapa thams cad mkhyen par rgyu de bzhin nyid gang yin pad ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ny+tsa'i 'dus tapheg pa'i rkyen gyis

tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin par zhi/ de bzhin nyid gcig pago/ lus kyi 'dus te reg nga 'i rkyen gyis tshel ba'i deng zhin nyid gang yin pa

00 dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa den/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad na khyend

nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin de ni/ dbazhin nyid gcig pa'o// sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad na khyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yane pa de ni/de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o/

chukhams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// na khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

bdakyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin de gcigapago mngag khams kyi deng zhane nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa than sa cad na khyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ desazhin de gcig pa'o//

mamakha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin parteni/ dbazhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam parnga shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin kwid gang yin pa dang//
ma mas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pad na/ dbazhin nyide gcig ra ko/ mtshig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni
de bzhin nyid gcig pago/ 'du byedakyi de bzhinang gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thamasacad matsun pa nyid kyi de bzhin de gang yin padan/ de bzhin de gcig pa// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang
yan pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyidabazhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams

ba cad m byan nga nyid kyi de bzhin dgang yin pa de'i/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyenapa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni ) de bzhin nyid

[– ]gcig pa go/ geg nga 'i de bzhinanyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de kyi de bzhinanyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thanas rtsam

mkhyen pa nyidakyi de bzhin nyid gang yin padoni/ de bzhin de gcig pa'o// sred pa 'i de bzhin nyid gang yin nga dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de kya de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de ba na nyid gcig pa 'og

lan pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig nga ngo// srid pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnan nga thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyir gcig pa'o// skye ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa kho)

rgang shi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang [: ]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyide bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyidagacig nga 'o// pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/

[a/]rnam pacha nas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin shing gcig pa'o// tshul khrims kyi phathob tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin+te/

nyid gang yin pa dan/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// bzod pa'i pha bol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin nga de ni de bzhin de gcig pa 'o/

brtson 'grus kyi pha bal tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin kidagacig pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'a de bzhin

nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par re bzhin nyid gang yi ni pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa deni/ de bzhin nyid gcig nga 'o// nang stong ra nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 1 de bzhin nyid

gcig pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang ) rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni ) de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi nga ba'in nying gang 5/

nga dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin par ni/ re bzhin nyid gcig nga 'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyan pa nyid kyi de nyin nyid/
@#// gar yazhepa de ni/dbanagide gcig dgo// chan po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnamar zams cad makhyen de de bzhin nyide gang yin pa'izhi/ debazhi de
gcige ragro/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhi de gang yin pa dani/de bzhin de gcig go/ 'dus byas stong pa de kyi dbazhin

ni de gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad na khyen nga nyidakyi de bzhin gang yin pa den/ de bzhin 'degacig pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyade kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad m khyan
tad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yazhe par/ de bzhin nyidagacig pa'o// mtha' 'a sa 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de

na de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// thog marang thamamed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhine nying gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa 'o//

bo ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de brgyuda'adegang yin pa dan) dbazhin nyid gcig pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/

rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de na/ dbazhin nyid gcig nga 'o// chos thamasacad stong pa nyidakyi de bzhin nyid gang yin ba dang/ rnamang than sa cad n khyenang nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang

yin pa de ni/ de bzhin shad gcig pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyade stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin nga dang/ rnam pa thams cad na khyen panyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mi dmige

pa stong pa kid kyi de bzhims de gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig ra 'o// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin ted

gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin 'dagacig pa'o// dngos pom du nga 'i nge de nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa rung/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyan nga nyid kyi de bzhine nyid gang yin pa/de ni/ de

bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyidabazhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de'i/ dbazhan nyid gcig pa'o// yang dag par song ba rnams

kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyidagang yin pa den/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin 'de gang yin pa dang/ rnamu

bam sa cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyide gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dbang po rnamasakyi dbazhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin de gang ya pa ni
deb de nyid gcage pa'o// stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang ya na nga de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// byang

sa chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de nga zhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa den de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'phags pa'i 'am anal ga brgyad pa'i de bzhin/
nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidakyi de bzhin skor gar yin pa de'i/ de ngawen nyid gcig pa'o// 'phags pa'i bdan nga rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang : rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin nga de ni/ de
bzhin nyid gcig pa 'o// tshad med pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ dbazhim de gcig pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms

par 'jug pa rnam sa kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de nga zhin nyid gang yin pa da ni/ de bzhane 'de gcig pa'o// rnam rar thar pa rnams kyid bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/

rnam pa thams cad na khyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mal gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa den/ rnam nga thon sa caram khyen

panyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ deb na'ang gcig pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshanam mad pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/

pa nyid de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa 'o// na ngan pa shes nga rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dan de bzhin

gcig nga 'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thun sa cad ma khyan pa )de kyi de bzhin nyidagang yan nga de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin

nga dang/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyenang nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad na khyen ro
nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ma 'ogs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin de dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin ked gang yin pa de na/ de bzhin

nyid gcig pa'o// so so yang dag dang rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang 3 rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyidagang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// byams pa chen po'i

de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad na khyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa da na/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa 'o// snying rje chen pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa//
nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyerang nyid kyi/
ba dbazhin nyid gang yin pa de na/ de bzhin nyid gcig nga 'o// shes rab kyi nges la du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa 'a sa le'u sum cu brgyad do/// shes rab kyi pha srol du phyin pa stong phrag
brgya pa bam po zhig brgya nyer drug pa// denas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang/ gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phyi na dang/ lha rdzas kyi ma tog ut+pal dang 8
pa dang/ ku mu da dang/ dun da' ka mang po khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das gang nang de 'a gas su 'thob bar gyur to// gter nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ nga tsam ldan 'das kyi zhabs
gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu bod do// 'khedanas 'dod pa na spyod ra dang: gzugag ud pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis ) bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams // shes rab kyang l du phyin pa zab mo 'du las 'di skad du ) gzugs ltung rnam pa/
thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnamar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs ste// tshor ba nyid rnam ngopa thams cad mkhyen nga// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes nyid rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par

shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad na khyen pa ste// rnam pa thams cad na khyen pa nyid kyang rnam pa ngashes pa'o// mgo shing rnam pa thun gcad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thun sa cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig go na

ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa than sa rung mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna nyid rnan pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'o// lce 'ad rnan pa thams cad

mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lcango// lus nyid rnam nga ldan na cad mkhyen pa lta/ rnam pa than gcad na khyen nga khyed kyang 'u ga so// yade nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yod do// gzugs nyare rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen nga ste/ rnam pa thams cad na khyenang nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgra'o// dri shId rnam pa tham sa ca4 la khyen da ste/ rnam pa than sa cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dri'o/ de nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyidakyang re'o/ 'jig nyid rnam pa thams cad na khyenang ste/ rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang reg go/ chos nyid rnan nga than sa rud na khyen pa so rnam pa thon sa tshad ma khyan nga nyid kyang chos so//
mige gi rnam pa/ shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad nas khyen nga// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mige garnam pa shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnan nga ra shes pa 'o// sna'i rnam par shes patid rnam de thams cad mkhyen pa// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam pa snashas pa'o/
lca'i rnam pa cashes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa sta rnam pa thams cad na khyen pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes nga 'o// lus kyi na nga ras nga nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa
thams cad na khyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam pa shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam pa sna shes pa da rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nga// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ya de kya rnam par shes pa
mag ge 'dus yeg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang sta/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te theg pa 'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pakod rnam nga thams cad na khyen pa ste/ rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang na ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam ra than sa cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thumasacad mkhyen pa nyide kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ lca'i 'dus te

N+NaM mirig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa skyo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

[no]nyid kyang 'as kyi 'dus theg pa 'o// yid kyi dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa tham sa rudan khyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen/

gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa than sa cad ma khyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa sta/

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg nga 'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sna 'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa sta/ rnam pa thun sa cad mkhyenang nyid kyang sna'i 'dus

te reg nga 'irkyen gyisAtshar ba'o lcel 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba u0f7ada rnam pa thams cad mkhyen da lta/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dug te reg pa'o rkyenagyis tshor ba'o//
lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rgyan gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// yod kyi 'dus te reg
pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba'o// sa'i khams kid rnam nga thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so/ mu ra ban sanyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnan ra than sa cad man pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so// mo'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad
[ri]@#// mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang me'i khams so// rlung gi khams tad rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rlung gi
khams so// nam mkha'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nga nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/

wA rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams sa// nang ga pa nyid rnam pa thams cad n khyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o/ 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams
cad n khyen pa// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thanas cad mkhyen pa starnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ ning
dang gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nga ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mang dang gzugs so/ skye mched drug 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nga/ 3 rnam pa thams cad mkhyan pa//
nyid kyang skye mched drug go/ rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa nyid kyang phug pa 'o// tshor ba kid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhan
panyid kyang tshor ba'o// sad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang ste/ rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa nyid kyang srid pa'o// 'a na pa nyid rnam pa tham sa cadon khyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid kyang len nga 'o/ srid pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sred pa 'o// skyab zhing rnam pa thon sa rud na khyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shinyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa 'i pha rol tung nyu nga nyid rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa ste/ rnam pa

than sa rung mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang 'o// tshul khrims kyi bo' duphyan pa 'di rnam pa thun so cad na khyenang ste/ rnam pa thams cad na khyen pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin

pa'o/ brjod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de rnam ngo thams cad mkhyen pa sta rnan nga thun gcad na khyen pa nyid kyang nga zer nga 'i ra 'du ngun nga 'o// brtson 'grus kyi dpal tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi ra sol tu phyin pa po// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad na khyan pa sta/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa no// zhing stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa so/ rnam nga thams cad mkhyen pa nyad kyang nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad

kumakhyen pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid de// phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa lta/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyanang stang pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam

ba thams cad mkhyen pa sta rnam pa thams cad n khyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa de ded// chan pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thums cad mkhyenang sta/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyan pa nyid kyang chen pa stong pa nyid

[– ]da don dam pa stong pa nyide rnam pa thums cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid de// 'dus byas stong pa nga rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams
cad makhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' 'as

rgasapa stong pa nyidan sa pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa sta/

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid de// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dar ba med pa stong pa nyid
do/ rang bzhin stong pa nyide rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chosathams cad stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ ma

bathams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nga ge mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de//

mi dmashes pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mdamags pa stong nga nyid do// dngos po me da nga stong pa nyid rnam nga thom sacad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam

bathamasacad mkhyen pa de kyang dngos po ma dpa stong pa nyid de// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ngo bo 'ang stong pa ched do// dngos nga mod nga 'i

ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa sta/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po me da nga 'i ngo bo da stong du 'de de// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam pa tham sa cad na byar nga ste/ rnam

pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhug pa rnams sa// yang dag par sbyong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang ste/ rnan dang thon sa rud mkhyenang nyid kyang yang dag nga 'a sdang ba zlar sa so//
rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phral gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang nga nyid rnam pa pham mur ra rna can du ste rkur du
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag u0f38da nus da
[p/ ]/thams cad mkhyen ng// rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa nyidakyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnamasas// 'phags pa'i 'o ma yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang ste//
mar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i 'an yan lag brgyud pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
so bsam gtan nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pasu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad med pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyan pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de kyang gzugs mdapa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
so rnam par shar pa nyid rnam pa thamasacad na khyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nga ted kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'darnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa ste// rnam pa thon sa cad mkhyan pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam pa thar pa'i sgo stongang nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa
sh+tsa mad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang 3 mtshanas med nga rang/ snon pa rang nga ngo
shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// tingang 'dzin nyid rnam pa thon su rung na khyen pa// rnam da than sa rungan byand
nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so// gzungs kyi sgo nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgornan sa so// de bzhin gshegs nga 'i stobs [︽]da rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dbazhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// mi 'jigs pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid kyang ma 'jigs pa rnams so// so so yang dgangar rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyan pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa nan sa so// byams
dachen po nyid rnam pa thamagacad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o// snying rje chen po 'de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
tud kyang skade rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam nga than bcud mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sa ngas rgyun[']kyi chos ma 'dres po rnams
gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid kyade bzhin nyidegang yane nga dan/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gzhis su med cing gnyis su byas de
wa @#// de[：]tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa den/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med rung gnyis su bya cher/

de 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa lta/ gnyis sumedacinge gnyis su byas med de// 'du byed kyade bzhin/

ts+tshA kid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyade bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// rnam dang shes pa'i de bzhin nyid/
gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dan/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med rung gnyis su byas med do// mig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin
pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin de gang yin nga/ de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gas su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ d+hAn ba[Q]de bzhin kid gang yin pa dang/ rnam nga/

than ga cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gshis su byang mad do// sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa kid
kyi de bzhenyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid

gang yan pa/de'u ) de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste ) gnyis su med cing gshis su byar med do// lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nga nyid kyi de bzhed zhang gang yin dang ni de bzhin
tad gcag pa ) gnyis su med cing gtes su byang ni nga de// yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams rud mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa re re bzhin cing gcig pa ste//
gnyis su mad cing gshis su byang med do// gzugs kyi de bzhin ljid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin tid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhinached gcig pa// gnyis su mudatsang
gnyis su bur steng do sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ cham pa ldan sa cad na khyen da 'dakyi deb zhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin kid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su mdatsang gnyis su ngaramangad/
dri'ing btsan nyid gang yin de dang/ rnam pa than gcad mkhyen pa nyid kyi da bzhin 'di gang yin nga da ni/ dbazhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gzhes su ma darung nga)ches su byung mang da nga de bzhin nyid
gang ya na nga dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 'a khyed kyi de bzhin da gang yanapa de/ de bgane nyid gcigang sa/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byung na da de/ rtseg de bzhin[︽]da la nga na nga
dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de na/ de bzhan nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su dur mang do// chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang la na da dang/ rnam nga
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dbazhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cingaganyis su byar med do// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin de gang
yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin 'degang yunang du ni/ de bzhin de gcig pa ste 3 gnyis su med cingo gnyis su byas med do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid/
zla/ gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yind dan de bzhinakad gcig pa sku/ ga)ga su mad cing gnyis su bar ma dad// sna'i rnam pa shes pa'i de bzhin nyid
gang yin nga dang rnam pa thoms cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin de gang yin pa de// de bzhin nyid gcig pa// gas su med cing gzhes su byas yod/ lce'i rnam pa gnyis pa'i de bzhin nyid
gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gas su med cing gnyis su byar ma da do// lus kyi rnam nga lnga shes pa'-ide
bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam nga thams cad mkhyen pa/dekyi de ba'an nyid gang yin pa de na ) de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byas na dad// 5/da kyi rnamar bshes pa'i
wany+nyo de bzhin cha de gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yind don/ dbazhin kid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar me dade// mig gi 'dus te/
[n]]pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin dgacig nga/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byas ru nga da rna ba'i 'dus bab/

pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ da bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su mdacing gnyis su byar ra nga ngo// sna'i 'dus te reg pa la
de bzhin shing gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin 'byed gang yin pa de ni ) dang re 'dagaceg nga sa gnyis su med cing gnyis su bar da de// lce'i 'dus bab/
pa'i de nga chen nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyenang nyid kyi de bzhin nyade gang yin pa de na de bzhin nyid gcig nga lta/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su ngar mang de lus kyi 'dus to/
seg pa'i dbazhin nyid gang yin pa dang ) rnam pa thams cad mkhyin nga nyid kyi dbahan nyid gang yin nga da ni/ de bzhinany+tsade gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyen du bang rong do// yod kyi 'dus
tag pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin nga dang/ rnam pathams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig nga ste/ gnyis su re dacing/ sa su byar meng ngo/[·]che ba gi
'dus reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin shade gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyidegang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin de gcig pa ste/ ga)ga su na dang gnyis su byas
@#/ mdad// na pa'i 'o dus pa rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyid bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhi de gcig ra ska

gzhis sume da cing gshis su byar med do// sna'i 'dus tesegapa'i rkyen gyis tshor bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin kid gang yin pa de ni drobazhin nyid
gcig pa ste/ gnyis su mdacing gnyis su byang mdado/ lce'i bsdus reg pa'i rkyenagyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa kerakyi de bzhin t+tid gang yinab de ni/

dwa bzhin dgacig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gzhis su med cing gnyis su byaramad do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i dbazhun de gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen pa/
nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin kid gcig pa lta/ gnyis su med cing gas su byas mad de// sa'i khan sakyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
de bzhin nyid gang na pa da ni ) de bzhin nyid gcigeng ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam nga thams cad mkhyen pa tUr kyi
[2 ]de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ ga)sa su med cing gnyis su byas te dado// de'i khan sa kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa than sacad ma byan pa 'ur kye daM
bzhin de gang yunang don/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su sa na da de// rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyir gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang 'ad kyi da 'gi
nyid gang yin pa de ni/ debaden nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su mang mang gnyis su byang mad de// nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin de ga yin pa dang/ rnam pa tham sa cang mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
gang yin pa de na/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su mdarunge gnyis su byas na dad// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyade bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'od kyi de bzhin
nyid gang yin pa de na ) de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med de/ mjig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thamasacang na khyenang 'od kyi da bzhin nyid/
gang yin pa de ni/ da bzhin da gcig pa sta gnyis su med cing gnyis su byang mad de// 'du byed kyi dbazhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nga khrid kyi de bzhin ted gang 5 nang nga
de bzhi nyidagacigang na/ gnyis su med cing gshis su byas modango// rnam nga panyis da 'de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang ) de bzhin
nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do// ming dang gzugs kyade bzhin nyid gang yine pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
a pa de ni/ de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su mda'ang gnyis subyar mdud/ skye mched drugag de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyan pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yan pa/
dan dbazhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su med cing gas su byas na dad// rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad makhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yan paduni/
